about_the_game:
Hentai Lagoon is a puzzle game, the ultimate goal of which is to swap the blocks to collect the image.
But remember, the purpose of this game is to let you relax and enjoy the process.
To do this, we added a minimalistic interface and relaxing music.

Features:
Relaxing puzzle game.
Beautiful girls.
Beautiful music.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or for viewing at work: Nudity or sexual scenes, Adult Content.
All characters are over 21 years old.
non-consensual sex
Ordinary sex
BDSM and Using toys for sex

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560
